text: eeka ada kothek durata sarthaka welada?

itha ikmanin bara adukaraganimata gathayuthu aahara pilibandawa pawasuwahoth eya tharamak sithganna sulu mathrukawak wanu noanumanaya.

sthriyata garu sammana dakwana pawulata dewiyange balma labena bawath sthriyata danduwam pamunuwana aa athharina pirimiyata rajun wisin danduwam diya yuthu bawath manusmruthiyehi sandahan weyi. (3-55-59 da 111ga389) swamiyata bharyawa kerehi sampurna ayithiya athi bawath, sharirika wadha diyahaki bawath, ohuta anukulawa nohasirenne nam athhala haki bawath ohuta thawath thaneka sandahan karayi.
paramparawakata pera ape rate dakshathama ha ihalinma ugath tharuna tharuniyo wides ratawala ihala watup gewana rakiya wetha adi giya.
api dannawa ginum thabime krama dekak thiyenawa.
me nisa dashaka gananawayak yanathurawatama uthuru koriyanuwange manushya ghathana ginuma sarusarawath wiya.
loku barapathala waraddak.
ape kompaniya saha awata thamayi ayata rajakari pawarenne.

mage mawage pawulata samipa na hithawathkam thibu ohu mata menma mage asuren dana handunagena siti ape pakshaye sahodarawaru rasakata da aaharapana aadiyen pamanak nowa indum hitum pawa dimata idiripath wu kalayak wiya.
eheth, aarakshawa palamuwata thaba tharamak dushkara eheth athdakim bahula umange thula dumriya gamanata samawadi apa gaman kalemu.
meya rajaya wisin awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu karanayaki.
eheth balaporoththu wana same pahapath bawa ho nirogi kes kalambaak thawamath labi nathida?
guwan widuliye wikashanaya wu “muwan palassa” natyaye korale haminege charithaya rangapa aya wedika natya, teli natya saha sinamawatath thamange dayakathwaya laba dunna.
awuruddak nirmanaya wanne hamuwim saha…
"aparade mage wada palu wuna dawas dekak" ohu ma samanga kiweya.
adhyapanaya ihala yaddi, lokaye wenath thanwala sancharaya karaddi saha lokaya dana kiya gaddi, janathawage apekshawan da eeta samagamiwa wardhanaya wiya.
likhitha ithihasayen kiyawena kalayen adath rate bahutharaya sinhala bauddhayanya.

idiri dina nawaya thula usas pela prathipalawala saba thaththwaya ratata dana gatha haki bawa yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha pawasayi.usas pela prathipalawala siduwu pramada doshaya gana soya balimata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kamituwak path kara athi bawath ema kamitu warthawa thawa dina nawayakin elidakwana bawath amathiwaraya kiweya.thideneku ekama daththaya pariganakawalata athulath kirimen usas pela prathipalawala pramada doshayak wi athi bawata thorathuru labi athayida alahapperuma mahatha sandahan kaleya.yauwana katayuthu amathyanshayedi eeye (03) pawathi madhya sakachchawedi amathiwaraya me karunu anawaranaya keleya..
robart papadi kridawa sandaha puhunuwim arambaana wita ohuge wayasa 67ki.

waligepala tharanasewa niladhari soma indrani mahathmiyage meheya wima paridi pawathwena pitakanda layans yauwana samajaya jala awasi thawaya wenuwen peni sitiyeya .gama awata jala mulashra nomathi egam piyase sita pa sathapum dekak pamana dura athishaya dushkara kadu mudunaka sita kalapayata wathura ganima thaba sitha ganimatawath bari karanaki .

mema thakshanaya sandaha jarmanu aarakshaka balapathraya ( petant ) sandaha niyubronar mahatha wisin karana lada illima illu sanin prathishepa wuwada ohuge parawiyak wisin ganna lada saba bawata sahathika karana lada chayarupa prabhutha kala pasu 1908 wasare desamber masayedi ohuta ema aarakshaka balapathraya ( petant ) laba dena ladi.ohu wisin meme thakshanaya prasiddhiyata pathkaranu labuwe 1909 wasaredi pawathwanu labu drasden jathyanthara chayarupa pradrshanayyedi wana athara ohu meme thakshanaye prasiddiya sandaha farankfart jathyanthara guwan thakshanika pradarshanayedi saha 1910 saha 1911 wasaredi pawathwanu labu apransha guwan sandarshanayedi ohuge parawiyan wisin ganu labu chayarupa thapalpath lesa alawi kirimakda sidu karanu labiya.

kese wuwada, nagima matha ganudenu atharathura gupthakethitha wathkam mila barapathala lesa pahalata nam, eya yam thiranathmaka lakshyayak wu wita, welenda nisa aanthikaya amathumak ohuge thanpathu siyalu nathi wiya haki – mema ganudenuwe tharawkaruwan wisin wasa bala, welenda ginuma wetha aramudal ekathu kara natha nam,.

gaja mithuro wadasatahana yatathe 2009 wasare sita 2011 wasara dakwa kalaya thula hambanthota distha්rikkaye siyalu ma rajya aayathanawala ha pa්radeshawasin ge sahabhagithwayen yuthu wa sakas kala me salasuma sandaha 2012 wasare di gaja mithuro distha්rik kamituwa wisiin eekamathika wa anumathiya laba di thibe.

aananda therun wahanse: ewita pa pisa damima sandaha eewa pariharanaya karathi.

kad patha thama bharayata gena thibe.
eeth eyata sindu kiyannawath natannawath welawak na.
kiyanne nithara dalwemin pawathina, lanu kallak wani thiraya bawa oba dannawa.
